## Loading the data



```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r, message = FALSE}
contributions_to_elections <- contributions %>%
  inner_join(house_elections, by = c("cand_id" = "fec_id"))

```

> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()`
